title: Worst Case Scenario Book 2: Bug Out
description: A nuclear bomb has detonated in Atlanta, and an EMP has wiped out the U.S. power grid. The societal fabric of the country is ripping apart, and an invading force is making their presence known.With time and resources running out, the separated Burrows family is desperate to find each other.Bug Out, Book 2 in the Worst Case Scenario series, follows Ian, Leah and Grace Burrows as they try to individually cope with the new world reality controlled by an invading force and the physical challenge of simple survival. Can they find a way back to each other? And if they do, should they stay, or should they Bug Out?Are you prepared?
author: G. Allen Mercer
